awards.title: Helmholtz Prize
awards.subtitle: Precision measurements
description: The Helmholtz Prize is a prestigious international award in precision measurement and metrology, presented by the Helmholtz Fund in cooperation with the Physikalisch-Technische Bundesanstalt. It recognizes outstanding achievements that significantly improve the accuracy of physical measurements and advance experimental science.

The dual-comb hyperspectral digital holography technique developed by Dr. N. Picqu√© and I represents a breakthrough in scan-free wavefront reconstruction and three-dimensional metrology, highlighting the transformative potential of frequency-comb spectroscopy in advanced imaging.

awards.title: Bernard J. Couillaud Prize in Ultrafast Lasers
awards.subtitle: Optica Foundation and Coherent, Inc.
description: The Bernard J. Couillaud Prize in Ultrafast Lasers is an international award presented by the Optica Foundation in partnership with Coherent Inc.. It recognizes outstanding early-career researchers whose work has the potential to significantly advance the science and applications of ultrafast photonics. Recipients receive a research grant of about $20,000 to support innovative projects with meaningful scientific and technological impact.
The award acknowledges my work on ultrafast spectroscopy methods for precision measurement and imaging.
